## isString() function

检查值value是否为string类型

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isString(value: unknown): value is string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is string

如果value等于String类型,那么返回true,否则返回false
